issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Description:
If start testing "Email Dialog" in landscape mode, Photos Gallery view appears in incorrect (portrait) mode. If start testing in portrait mode and then rotate device to landscape, Photo Gallery view does not change orientation.
This bug occurs on 1.8.2 and 2.0.1. Does not reproduce with iPad devices.

Steps:
1. Run KitchenSink in landscape mode
2. Go to Base UI-Views-Email Dialog

Expected result:
Photos Gallery should appear in correct mode

Actual result:
Photos Gallery appears in incorrect mode
fields.summary: iOS: KitchenSink - Photos Gallery pops up in incorrect mode on iPhone and iPod
fields.environment:
Titanium Studio, build: 2.0.1.201204132053
Titanium SDK: 2.0.2.v20120417133255
Devices: iPhone 4S (5.1), iPod 3rd Gen. (4.0.2)

comments.body:
The problem reproduces with release 3.0.2 and 3.1.0

Tested with

Titanium Studio, build: 3.0.1.201212181159
Titanium SDK version: 3.1.0 

Titanium SDK version: 3.0.2 
iOS iPhone Simulator: iOS SDK version: 6.0

Device: Samsung galaxy s duos Android version: 4.0.4
Android Emulator: Android SDK version: 2.2

working fine on android
Resolving ticket as Invalid as there is now a new version of Kitchen Sink available and we no longer support the version which relates to this ticket.
